graphql.query:
mutation {
    updateGherkinTestDefinition(
        issueId: "{{T2_ID}}",
        gherkin: "Given I have entered <input_1> into the calculator
And I have entered <input_2> into the calculator
When I press <button>
Then the result should be <output> on the screen

  Examples:
    | input_1 | input_2 | button | output |
    | 20      | 30      | add    | 50     |
    | 2       | 5       | add    | 7      |
    | 3       | 6       | add    | 9      |" ) 
        {
        issueId
        gherkin
    }
}
